title: Wild in the Highlands
description: Highlander Romance with paranormal shape-shifting wolfs.Bridget has recently come of age to marry. However, she’s never yearned for any of the men in her clan, nor for the domestic lifestyle she’d have as a wife. Desperate for a way out, Bridget flees to the forest. What she finds there both thrills and frightens her.Will and his brothers are not normal warriors. When Will finds Bridget, he finds his feelings for her growing until he can’t hide them any longer. Will their new love be able to overcome his supernatural abilities—and, more importantly, will it be strong enough to overcome a battle when Bridget’s clan comes looking for her?
author: Olivia Myers
